title: Greater Invisibility
content:
ng Pass Without Trace (+20 total) is guaranteed to keep invisibility 95% of the time for at least 5 attacks, dropping down to 90% on the 6th attack, 85% on the 7th, and so on.

If your other party members are kept out of sight, you can continue to attack almost for free in turn based mode until invisibility finally breaks.

Lvl 4 Spells Banishment ♦ Blight ♦ Confusion ♦ Conjure Minor Elemental ♦ Conjure Woodland Beings ♦ Death Ward ♦ Dimension Door ♦ Dominate Beast ♦ Evard's Black Tentacles ♦ Fi
